setting/battle_setting_007:
Activates accelerated battle speed
while in Auto Mode.

Activates Auto Mode if device has
been idle for a while.
setting/battle_setting_009:
Displays a list of actions by allies and
opponents in the order they will occur.
setting/battle_setting_015:
Some settings cannot be changed
during co-op battles.
setting/battle_setting_017:
Automatically skips all cutscene
animations that display during battles
(except ally sync moves and
theme skills).
setting/battle_setting_019:
Carries over any changes made to
settings during battle.
setting/battle_setting_022: Toggle HP bar display for opposing sync pairs.
setting/battle_setting_026: Toggle target marker display for allied sync pairs.
setting/battle_setting_028:
Allows sync pairs to use moves
automatically during battle.

setting/battle_setting_037:

animations that display during battles
(except ally sync moves, max moves,
and theme skills).
